data.title: Here’s a look at the new couple
authors: CHARLES B. SCIRBONA Poughkeepsie (N.Y.) Journal, The Courier
data.meta_description: Much of the buzz about Chelsea Clinton and fiance Marc Mezvinsky has been about the details and cost of their wedding in Rhinebeck, N.Y. But there is more to be know about the couple. Most people kno…
data.text:
Much of the buzz about Chelsea Clinton and fiance Marc Mezvinsky has been about the details and cost of their wedding in Rhinebeck, N.Y. But there is more to be know about the couple.

Most people know that Clinton, 30, is the daughter of former President Bill Clinton and current Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton, but many may not know about her fiance.

Mezvinsky, 32, is the son of Marjorie Margolies-Mezvinsky and Ed Mezvinsky, the youngest of their 11 children.

Both parents have their own political pasts. Ed Mezvinsky was an Iowa congressman for two terms in the 1970s and was recently released from prison after serving almost five years for bank and wire fraud. Mezvinsky’s mother served one term in congress during the early 1990s as a Pennsylvania representative.

According to The Associated Press, the couple met as teenagers in Washington and attended Stanford University together but didn’t start publicly dating until a few years ago.

Clinton followed up her time at Stanford by attending graduate school at University College at Oxford University in England, where she studied international relations.

In 2003, Clinton went to work at the New York City consulting firm McKinsey & Co. She left in 2006 to work at Avenue Capital Group, a hedge fund also based in New York City.

Clinton and Mezvinsky live in Manhattan, where Mezvinsky works for the hedge fund 3G Capital and Clinton recently received a master’s degree from Columbia University’s Mailman School of Public Health.

Chelsea Clinton Born: Feb. 27, 1980, in Little Rock, Ark. Lives: Near Gramercy park in Manhattan. Education: Studied history at Stanford University; received a master’s degree in international relations from Oxford University and recently received a master’s from Columbia University’s school of public health. Marc Mezvinsky Born: Dec. 15, 1977, in Philadelphia. Lives: In the Flatiron District of Manhattan. Education: Attended Stanford, where he major in philosophy and religious studies. Employment: Investment banker, formerly with Goldman Sachs; currently with 3G Capital.

Couple profile
